mapper.insert: INSERT INTO question (board_idx, member_idx, content) VALUES (#{boardIdx}, #{userIdx}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT a.name, b.content, b.write_date FROM member a, question b WHERE b.board_idx = #{boardIdx} AND a.idx = b.member_idx ORDER BY b.write_date DESC;
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET content = #{content} WHERE idx = #{idx} AND member_idx = #{userIdx}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM question WHERE idx = #{idx} AND member_idx = #{userIdx}
